channel.title: Webclient Help
channel.description:
Hey guys,
I need help making the files from my www/data folder to download onto peoples computers that run the webclient. I have managed to get it to work (signing the jar and others..) and a folder saves onto the pc, but the files don't save in their at all, and it will disconnect my internet for some reason, I think thats when it tries to download.
I need someones help on here, maybe MSN & teamview, please reply back or add me on j.a.m.e.z@live.com
Thanks!

item.title: Webclient Help
item.dc:creator: @bonzakid bonzakid
item.description:
@bonzakid wrote:

Hey guys,

I need help making the files from my www/data folder to download onto peoples computers that run the webclient. I have managed to get it to work (signing the jar and others…) and a folder saves onto the pc, but the files don’t save in their at all, and it will disconnect my internet for some reason, I think thats when it tries to download.

I need someones help on here, maybe MSN & teamview, please reply back or add me on j.a.m.e.z@live.com

Thanks!
